parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Allows camera shake effects via [[addCamShake]]. If set to [[false]], then a currently active shake effect will stop immediately.
By default, shake effects are enabled, but once they have been disabled by this command, they will have to be enabled first, in order to be visible.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableCamShake''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> value: [[Boolean]] - If [[true]], then shake effects are visible

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableCamShake]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addCamShake]], [[setCamShakeDefParams]], [[setCamShakeParams]], [[resetCamShake]]
</value></part></template>
